source.c75b5ece:
#GENERAL

import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
import seaborn as sns
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import matplotlib as mpl
import matplotlib.cm as mtpltcm
from mpl_toolkits.mplot3d import Axes3D
import random
import time

#PATH PROCESS

import os
import os.path
from pathlib import Path
import glob
from scipy.io import loadmat
import nibabel as nib
import csv
from astropy.visualization import astropy_mpl_style
from astropy.utils.data import get_pkg_data_filename
from astropy.io import fits
import astropy
from astropy import units as u 
import astropy.wcs as fitswcs
from specutils import Spectrum1D, SpectralRegion
from astropy.cosmology import WMAP9 as Cosmology

#IMAGE PROCESS

from PIL import Image
from keras.preprocessing import image
from tensorflow.keras.preprocessing.image import ImageDataGenerator
import cv2
from keras.applications.vgg16 import preprocess_input, decode_predictions
from keras.preprocessing import image
from skimage.feature import hessian_matrix, hessian_matrix_eigvals
from scipy.ndimage.filters import convolve
from skimage import data, io, filters
import skimage.morphology as morph
import skimage.exposure as skie
import skimage
from skimage.morphology import convex_hull_image, erosion
from IPython import display
from scipy.ndimage import gaussian_filter
from mpl_toolkits.mplot3d.art3d import Poly3DCollection
import matplotlib.patches as patches

#SCALER & TRANSFORMATION

from sklearn.preprocessing import StandardScaler
from sklearn.preprocessing import MinMaxScaler
from keras.utils.np_utils import to_categorical
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split
from keras import regularizers
from sklearn.preprocessing import LabelEncoder
import sklearn

import pydub
from scipy.io.wavfile import read, write
import librosa
import librosa.display
import IPython
from IPython.display import Audio
import scipy
from scipy import signal
from scipy.fft import fftshift

#IGNORING WARNINGS

from warnings import filterwarnings

filterwarnings("ignore",category=DeprecationWarning)
filterwarnings("ignore", category=FutureWarning) 
filterwarnings("ignore", category=UserWarning)
filterwarnings("ignore", category=RuntimeWarning)
source.8d6e1dff:
NI_PATH = "../input/center-of-all-observable-galaxiesfits-allesa/GALAXIES_CENTER/NGC4725/NEAR_INFRARED/n3zb98010_mos.fits"
HST_PATH = "../input/center-of-all-observable-galaxiesfits-allesa/GALAXIES_CENTER/NGC4725/OPTICAL/hst_08597_46_wfpc2_total_pc_drz.fits"
ISO_PATH = "../input/center-of-all-observable-galaxiesfits-allesa/GALAXIES_CENTER/NGC4725/ISO/csli21501489.fits"
NEWTON_PATH = "../input/center-of-all-observable-galaxiesfits-allesa/GALAXIES_CENTER/NGC4725/XMM_Newton_Soft_Xray/P0112550401EPX0003COLIM8000.FTZ"
OM_PATH = "../input/center-of-all-observable-galaxiesfits-allesa/GALAXIES_CENTER/NGC4725/XMM_OM_Optical/P0112550401OMX000USIMAGU000.FTZ"

NI_OPEN = fits.open(NI_PATH)
HST_OPEN = fits.open(HST_PATH)
ISO_OPEN = fits.open(ISO_PATH)
NEWTON_OPEN = fits.open(NEWTON_PATH)
OM_OPEN = fits.open(OM_PATH)

NI_SCI = NI_OPEN[1].data
NI_ERR = NI_OPEN[2].data
NI_DQ = NI_OPEN[3].data
NI_SAMP = NI_OPEN[4].data
NI_TIME = NI_OPEN[5].data
HST_SCI = HST_OPEN[1].data
HST_WHT = HST_OPEN[2].data
HST_CTX = HST_OPEN[3].data
NEWTON_PRIMARY = NEWTON_OPEN[0].data
NEWTON_RAW = NEWTON_OPEN[1].data
NEWTON_FWC = NEWTON_OPEN[2].data
NEWTON_OOT = NEWTON_OPEN[3].data
OM_PRIMARY = OM_OPEN[0].data
OM_EXPOSURE = OM_OPEN[1].data
OM_QUALITY = OM_OPEN[2].data
ISO_PRIMARY = ISO_OPEN[0].data

WIDE_SCALE_NI = NI_SCI[80:190,130:240]
ZOOMED_WIDE_SCALE_NI = NI_SCI[110:160,170:220]
WIDE_SCALE_HST = HST_SCI[80:570,280:720]
ZOOMED_WIDE_SCALE_HST = HST_SCI[240:390,430:560]
WIDE_SCALE_NEWTON = NEWTON_PRIMARY[1][230:500,200:470]
ZOOMED_WIDE_SCALE_NEWTON = NEWTON_PRIMARY[1][290:450,240:420]
source.a2fb0171:
SATO_WIDE_SCALE_NI = filters.sato(WIDE_SCALE_NI)
SATO_ZOOMED_WIDE_SCALE_NI = filters.sato(ZOOMED_WIDE_SCALE_NI)
SATO_WIDE_SCALE_HST = filters.sato(WIDE_SCALE_HST)
SATO_ZOOMED_WIDE_SCALE_HST = filters.sato(ZOOMED_WIDE_SCALE_HST)
SATO_WIDE_SCALE_NEWTON = filters.sato(WIDE_SCALE_NEWTON)
SATO_ZOOMED_WIDE_SCALE_NEWTON = filters.sato(ZOOMED_WIDE_SCALE_NEWTON)

RND_WIDE_SCALE_HST = filters.roberts_neg_diag(WIDE_SCALE_HST)
RND_ZOOMED_WIDE_SCALE_HST = filters.roberts_neg_diag(ZOOMED_WIDE_SCALE_HST)


MI_WIDE_SCALE_HST = filters.meijering(WIDE_SCALE_HST)
MI_ZOOMED_WIDE_SCALE_HST = filters.meijering(ZOOMED_WIDE_SCALE_HST)
MI_WIDE_SCALE_NEWTON = filters.meijering(WIDE_SCALE_NEWTON)
MI_ZOOMED_WIDE_SCALE_NEWTON = filters.meijering(SATO_ZOOMED_WIDE_SCALE_NEWTON)

FCF_WIDE_SCALE_HST = skimage.feature.corner_foerstner(WIDE_SCALE_HST)
FCF_ZOOMED_WIDE_SCALE_HST = skimage.feature.corner_foerstner(ZOOMED_WIDE_SCALE_HST)
FCF_WIDE_SCALE_NEWTON = skimage.feature.corner_foerstner(WIDE_SCALE_NEWTON)
FCF_ZOOMED_WIDE_SCALE_NEWTON = skimage.feature.corner_foerstner(SATO_ZOOMED_WIDE_SCALE_NEWTON)


SATO_ISO = filters.sato(ISO_PRIMARY)
RND_ISO = filters.roberts_neg_diag(ISO_PRIMARY)
MI_ISO = filters.meijering(ISO_PRIMARY)
FCF_ISO = skimage.feature.corner_foerstner(ISO_PRIMARY)
source.502aef1c:
figure,axis = plt.subplots(1,2,figsize=(22,7))
    
DENSITY_FUNC = axis[0].imshow(WIDE_SCALE_NI,cmap="flag")
axis[0].set_title("WIDE NEAR INFRARED")
axis[0].axis("off")
    
axis[1].plot(WIDE_SCALE_NI.flatten(),color="red")
axis[1].set_title("PLOT")
axis[1].axis("off")
    
figure.colorbar(DENSITY_FUNC,shrink=0.5,label="DENSITY",location="right",extend="max")
plt.tight_layout()
plt.show()

source.05a3f0c8:
STAR_CIRCLE = WIDE_SCALE_HST[210:270,180:240]

SATO_STAR_CIRCLE = filters.sato(STAR_CIRCLE)
MI_STAR_CIRCLE = filters.meijering(STAR_CIRCLE)
source.7a207193:
for x_spec in SPECTRAL_LIST:
    
    figure,axis = plt.subplots(1,2,figsize=(20,20))
    
    axis[0].imshow(SATO_STAR_CIRCLE / 255.,cmap=x_spec) # target
    axis[0].set_title("SATO" + " / "+ x_spec)
    axis[0].axis("off")
    
    axis[1].imshow(MI_STAR_CIRCLE / 255.,cmap=x_spec)
    axis[1].set_title("MI" + " / "+ x_spec)
    axis[1].axis("off")

    
    plt.tight_layout()
    plt.show()
